name: Super Powered Square
description:
Super Powered Square is a mismatched experience where you play a Super Hero with random powers and abilities trying to become the best.

Combine Supers & Powers

Within your arsenal you hold a number of cards that you choose before a level, choosing a Super card and a Power card from a randomly drawn selection you will have to learn and embrace your abilities and try, try again.

There are not many levels but a little bit more variety can be gained from playing with different combinations. Sorry for any issues.

This game was made in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Jam with the theme: "Joined Together"
